title: Junior Suit
text: A luxurious room that typically includes a separate living area and bedroom, making it ideal for travelers who value extra space and privacy. This room time: is perfect for couples or families who want a bit of extra space and luxury during their stay.

title: Family Room
text: A spacious room designed to accommodate families, with separate sleeping areas for children and adults. This room time: is perfect for families with kids who need more space to spread out.

title: Standard Room
text: A comfortable and basic room, typically featuring a bed, desk, and bathroom. This is a good option for travelers who are looking for a basic, budget-friendly accommodation.

title: Delux Room
text: An upgraded version of the standard room, offering more space and additional amenities such as a comfortable seating area, better views, and premium bedding. This is a great option for travelers who want a bit more comfort and luxury.
